overview: Disciples of Kiss will savor the release of this compilation of archival film featuring the legendary rockers whose hard-driving music laid the foundation for pop metal and arena rock. Their flamboyant costumes, face paint and elaborate stage shows made them a teen favorite in the 1970s. This collection of behind-the-scenes footage, infamous interviews and TV clips delves into the Kiss mystique, offering a new perspective of the band.
title: Kiss: Asylum of Death: Interviews
